_comment.appOnItunes: Link to the app on the App store.
_comment.support: Link to the main support page.
_comment.searchSupport: Link to the help desk support page.
_comment.emailAlreadyInUse: Shown when the user tries to create an account with an email that is already in use. Links to support page explaining issue and what can be done.
_comment.whyToVerifyFingerprintArticle: Link to an article explaining why a user should verify conversations using fingerprints.
_comment.howToVerifyFingerprintArticle: Link to an article explaining how to manually verify conversations using fingerprints.
_comment.privacyPolicy: Link to the privacy policy page.
_comment.legal: Link to app's homepage for legal information, e.g terms of use and data processing addendum.
_comment.licenseInformation: Link to the license information page.
_comment.passwordReset: Link to the password reset page.
_comment.askSupportArticle: Link to the support page where the user can submit a support request for various issues.
_comment.reportAbuse: Link to the support page where a user can report an abuse issue.
_comment.wireEnterpriseInfo: Link to an article explaining the various features of Wire.
_comment.legalHoldInfo: Link to an article explaining legal hold.
_comment.guestLinksInfo: Link to an article explaining how to create, share, and revoke a group conversation link.
_comment.unreachableBackendInfo: Shown when a user tries to send a message or create a group with users from different backends when one of the backends is not reachable. Links to a support page that explains the issue when one of the backend is offline.
_comment.federationInfo: Links to a support page explaining what Federation is.
_comment.mlsInfo: Link to the article about Messaging Layer Security (MLS). Shown in various places (e.g. system messages, warnings, error messages).
_comment.endToEndIdentityInfo: Link to the article about end-to-end identity. Shown in various places (e.g. system messages, warnings, error messages).
